p: By comparing the composition of bergamot essential oil with those of the gaseous phase in equilibrium with the liquid phase of BEO at 0, 22 and 40 °C, we observed that seven components of bergamot essential oil (terpinolene, ocimene, neral, gerianal, neryl acetate, α-terpineol, β-cariofyllene) were totally absent in the compositions of all analyzed gaseous phases.
